title: A Story About A Gal And A High-Spec Boy Falling In Love At A Cram School
alternative_title: Gal to Kouhensachi Danshi ga Yobikou de Koisuru Hanashi ; Gyaru to Kouhensachi Danshi ga Yobikou de Koisuru Hanashi ; ギャルと高偏差値男子が予備校で恋する話
status: Gal to Kouhensachi Danshi ga Yobikou de Koisuru Hanashi ; Gyaru to Kouhensachi Danshi ga Yobikou de Koisuru Hanashi ; ギャルと高偏差値男子が予備校で恋する話
description:
Description :
        Mashiro, a high school girl, is not very good at studying. Her grades are so bad that she has been accepted into a prep school...
She hates studying, but she can do her best if she thinks she can meet good-looking guys from other schools! At the prep school, she meets Kippei, who has a high deviation score in both face and study...?
